T06vmvkbh_u:739: grahaṇārthena yāvad viśuddhidvayārthena teṣu tadādhipatyād rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇe hi cakṣurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām ādhipatyaṃ sthāne jīvitendriyasya tadādhipatyenāmaraṇāt
T06vmvkbh_u:740: kulasandhāne strīpuruṣendriyayor apatyaprasavādhipatyād upabhoge vedanendriyāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalakarmaphalopabhogāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:745: kim aparam adhvatrayaṃ yathāyogaṃ phalahetūpayogārthenātīto 'dhvā phalahetvanupayogārthenānāgato 'dhvā hetūpayogaphalānupayogārthena pratyutpanno 'dhvā veditavyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:750: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanāsanimittārthena yat kiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā vedanānimittaṃ punar vedanāsthānīyā dharmā veditavyāḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:761: tenaiva svayam aśrutvā parato niryāṇārthena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:762: avikalpena jñānena svayaṃ niryāṇārthena mahāyānaṃ veditavyaṃ //
T06vmvkbh_u:765: nimittāt praśamāt sārthāt paścimaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ // III.22
T06vmvkbh_u:766: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ tatra saprajñaptir nāmakāyādayaḥ hetur bījasaṃgṛhītam ālayavijñānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:769: etat saprajñaptisahetukaṃ nimittaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:772: ) tasya vikalpakatvād asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ praśamaś ca nirodhaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:773: praśamārthaś ca tathatā tatra praśamo nirodho mārgaś ca yaś ca praśamo yena ceti kṛtvā praśamārthaḥ tathatā praśamasyārtha iti kṛtvā tathatāyā mārgālambanatvāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:775: ity etenārthena skandhādiṣu jñānaṃ skandhādikauśalyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:780: dṛśyatatvaṃ ca tatrādarśatatvaṃ mūlatatvaṃ tatra śeṣāṇāṃ darśanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:804: tayā sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastv āryā duḥkhataḥ paśyantīti /
T06vmvkbh_u:806: ātmābhiniveśavastu cittaṃ tatparīkṣayā nirodhasatyam avataraty ātmocchedabhayāpagamāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:812: parijñāte vipakṣe ca pratipakṣe ca sarvathā /
T06vmvkbh_u:814: smṛtyupasthānabhāvanayā vipakṣe pratipakṣe ca sarvaprakāraṃ parijñāte vipakṣāpagamāya pratipakṣopagamāya ca vīryañ caturdhā saṃpravartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:815: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāyeti vistaraḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:821: ) karmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ sarvārthasamṛddhihetutvāt sthitir atra cittasthitiḥ samādhir veditavyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:827: asaṃskāro 'tha saṃskāraḥ pañca doṣā ime matāḥ // IV.4
T06vmvkbh_u:832: eṣāṃ prahāṇāya katham aṣṭau prahāṇasaṃskārā vyavasthāpyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:833: catvāraḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya cchandavyāyāmaśraddhāprasrabdhayas te punar yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:834: āśrayo 'thāśritas tasya nimittaṃ phalam eva ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:836: āśrito vyāyāmas tasyāśrayasya cchandasya nimittaṃ śraddhā saṃpratyaye (/
T06vmvkbh_u:837: ) saty abhilāṣāt tasyāśritasya vyāyāmasya phalaṃ prasrabdhir ārabdhavīryasya samādhiviśeṣādhigamāc (Mvbh 52)
T06vmvkbh_u:838: cheṣāś catvāraḥ prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyacetanopekṣāś caturṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pratipakṣās te punaḥ smṛtyādayo veditavyā yathākramaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:841: smṛtir ālambane 'saṃpramoṣaḥ saṃprajanyaṃ smṛtyasaṃpramoṣe sati layauddhatyānubodhaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:845: ṛddhipādānām anantaraṃ pañcendriyāṇi śraddhādīni teṣāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:849: ṛddhipādaiḥ karmaṇyacittasyāropite mokṣabhāgīye kuśalamūle cchandādhipatyataḥ prayogādhipatyataḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:855: tāny eva śraddhādīni balavanti balānīty ucyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:859: yadā tāny aśraddhādibhir vipakṣair na vyavakīryante /
T06vmvkbh_u:866: avaropitamokṣabhāgīyasyendriyāṇy uktāny atha nirvedhabhāgīyāni kim indriyāvasthāyāṃ veditavyāny āhosvid balāvasthāyāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:867: dvau dvau nirvedhabhāgīyāv indriyāṇi balāni ca // IV.7
T06vmvkbh_u:873: caturtham anuśaṃsāṅgan niḥkleśāṅgaṃ tridhā mataṃ // IV.8
T06vmvkbh_u:890: bhāvanāmārge 'sya paricchedāṅgaṃ samyagdṛṣṭir laukikī lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhā yayā svādhigamaṃ paricchinatti /
T06vmvkbh_u:893: parasaṃbhāvanāṅgaṃ tridhā samyagvākkarmāntājīvās tair hi yathākramaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:894: dṛṣṭau śīle 'tha saṃlekhe paravijñaptir iṣyate // IV.10
T06vmvkbh_u:895: tasya samyagvācā kathāsāṃkathyaviniścayena prajñāyāṃ saṃbhāvanā bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:896: samyakkarmāntena śīle 'kṛtyākaraṇāt samyagājīvena saṃlekhe dharmeṇa mātrayā ca cīvarādyanveṣaṇāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:902: vibhutvavipakṣaś ca vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhāravibandhaḥ tatra prathamasya samyagvyāyāmaḥ pratipakṣas tena mārgabhāvanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:909: viparyastāpi aviparyāsānukūlāviparyastā viparyāsānubandhā aviparyastā viparyāsaniranubandhā ca yathākramaṃ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu /
T06vmvkbh_u:913: bodhisatvānāṃ svaparasāntānikāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā anityādibhir ākāraiḥ kāyādīn manasikurvanti /
T06vmvkbh_u:915: śrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ smṛtyupasthānādīni bhāvayanti yāvad eva kāyādīnāṃ visaṃyogāya /
T06vmvkbh_u:926: adhimuktau praveśe ca niryāṇe vyākṛtāv api /
T06vmvkbh_u:929: tatra hetvavasthā yā gotrasthasya pudgalasyāvatārāvasthā utpāditabodhicittasya prayogāvasthā cittotpādād ūrdham aprāpte phale /
T06vmvkbh_u:935: anuttarāvasthā buddhasya tata ūrdham avasthābhāvād adhimuktyavasthā bodhisatvānāṃ sarvasyām adhimukticaryābhūmau /
T06vmvkbh_u:936: praveśāvasthā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau niryāṇāvasthā taduttarāsu ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu /
T06vmvkbh_u:937: vyākaraṇāvasthā aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau kathikatvāvasthā navamyām abhiṣekāvasthā daśamyāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:943: aśuddhāśuddhaśuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ // IV.15
T06vmvkbh_u:944: tatrāśuddhāvasthā hetvavasthām upādāya yāvat prayogād aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā (Mvbh 57) śaikṣāṇāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:948: ) veditavyam ayaṃ gotrastho 'yam avatīrṇa ity evamādi /
T06vmvkbh_u:953: rucir vṛddhir viśuddhiś ca phalam etad yathākramaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:960: vipākaphalam adhipatiphalan niṣyandaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalañ ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:961: uttarottaram ādyañ ca tadabhyāsāt samāptitaḥ // IV.17
T06vmvkbh_u:963: uttarānuttaratvāc ca phalam anyat samāsataḥ // IV.18
T06vmvkbh_u:964: uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpāda ity evamādi paraṃparayā veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:971: visaṃyogaphalaṃ nirodhasākṣātkriyā abhyāsaphalaṃ samāptiphalaṃ ca kleśavisaṃyogaḥ (Mvbh 58)
T06vmvkbh_u:975: etāni catvāri abhyāsasamāptiphalaprabheda eva etad anyat phalaṃ samāsanirdeśato vyāsatas tv aparimāṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:982: sottarā bhāvanā niruttarā ca bhāvanā yālambanamanaskāraprāptiviśiṣṭā //
T06vmvkbh_u:990: phalānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saṃgrahataḥ tadviśeṣataḥ pūrvābhyāsataḥn uttarottaranirhārataḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:997: uddeśataḥ uttarottaraphalādīni catvāri nirdeśataḥ ānukūlyaphalādini ṣaṭ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1005: ānuttaryaṃ prapattau hi punar ālambane mataṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1007: trividham ānuttaryaṃ mahāyāne yenaitad anuttaraṃ yānaṃ pratipattyānuttaryaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1016: ity eṣā ṣaḍvidhā pratipattir yad uta paramā pratipattiḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1025: nairantaryam akṛcchratvaṃ vittatvaṃ ca parigrahaḥ // V.3
T06vmvkbh_u:1028: yad utaudāryaparamatā āyatatvaparamatā adhikāraparamatā akṣayatvaparamatā nairantaryaparamatā akṛcchratvaparamatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1038: ārambhaparamatādhimukticaryābhūmāv adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau pratilambhaparamatā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau /
T06vmvkbh_u:1043: tataś ca paramārthena daśa pāramitā matāḥ // V.4
T06vmvkbh_u:1044: yata eṣā dvādaśavidhā paramatā etāsu saṃvidyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1048: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1049: praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānam etāḥ pāramitā daśeti // V.5
T06vmvkbh_u:1051: anugraho 'vighātaś ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1053: akṣayatvaṃ sadā vṛttir niyataṃ bhogapācane // V.6
T06vmvkbh_u:1063: sarvajanmasu buddhotpādārāgaṇato dānādiṣu sadā pravartate balapāramitayā pratisaṃkhyānabhāvanābalābhyāṃ niyataṃ dānādiṣu pravartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1073: dānādīny adhikṛtya yathāprajñaptānāṃ sūtrādidharmāṇāṃ mahāyāne manasikaraṇam abhīkṣṇaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayyā prajñayā manasikārapratipattiḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:1074: sā triprakārayā prajñayā manasikriyā kaṃ guṇaṃkaroti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1079: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ // V.8
T06vmvkbh_u:1081: daśabhir dharmacaritaiḥ parigṛhītā veditavyā katamad daśadhā dharmacaritaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1083: prakāśanātha svādhyāyaś cintanā bhāvanā ca tat // V.9
T06vmvkbh_u:1084: mahāyānasya lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ parebhyo dānaṃ pareṇa vācyamānasya śravaṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1091: kasmān mahāyāna eva dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāphalan deśyate sūtreṣu na punaḥ śrāvakayāne /
T06vmvkbh_u:1112: sa eṣa kiṃlakṣaṇo veditavya ity ata āha /
T06vmvkbh_u:1116: hīnacittaṃca vikṣepaḥ parijñeyo hi dhīmatā // V.12
T06vmvkbh_u:1117: ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ ṣaḍvidho vikṣepo yo bodhisatvena parijñeyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1118: tatra vyutthānaṃ samādhitaḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyaiḥ prakṛtivikṣepaḥ viṣaye visāro bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1127: tatrāviparyāso daśavidhe vastuni veditavyaḥ / yad uta /
T06vmvkbh_u:1131: saṃyogāt saṃstavāc caiva viyogād apy asaṃstavāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1132: arthasatvam asatvañ ca vyañjane so 'viparyayaḥ /] V.14
T06vmvkbh_u:1133: saṃyoge sati vyañjanānām avicchinnoccāraṇatayā asya cedaṃ nāmeti saṃstavāt sārthakatvaṃ viparyayān nirarthakatvam iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1137: arthe sa cāviparyāsaḥ sadasatvena varjitaḥ // V.15
T06vmvkbh_u:1141: arthe yad darśanaṃ sa tatrāviparyāsaḥ arthasya satvena varjito grāhyagrāhakābhāvād asatvena varjitaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1145: grāhyagrāhakajalpaparibhāvito jalpamanaskāras tasya grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāśrayo bhavatīty ayaṃ manaskāre 'viparyāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1146: katamasmin manaskāre grāhyagrāhakasaṃprakhyānakāraṇe sa hy asau jalpamanaskāro 'bhilāpasaṃjñāparibhāvitatvāt grāhyagrāhakavikalpāśrayo veditavyaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:1147: māyādivad asatvañ ca satvaṃ cārthasya tan mataṃ [/]
T06vmvkbh_u:1149: yat tad arthasyāsatvaṃ satvaṃ cānantaram uktaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1150: tan māyādivan mataṃ yathā māyā na hastyādibhāvenāsti na ca naivāsti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1152: evam artho 'pi na cāsti yathā saṃprakhyāti grāhyagrāhakatvena na ca naivāsti tadbhrāntimātrāstitvāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1153: ādiśabdena marīcisvapnodakacandrādayo dṛṣṭāntā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā iti yan māyādyupamārthe
T06vmvkbh_u:1154: darśanād avisāraṃ cetasaḥ paśyati so 'visāre 'viparyāsas tena bhāvābhāvayoś cittasyāvisaraṇāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1159: yad idaṃ cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā iti yaj jñānaṃ sarvavikalpānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ svalakṣaṇe 'viparyāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1162: saṃvṛtyā tu nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1164: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasmāt sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.19
T06vmvkbh_u:1165: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid dharmo vidyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1166: tasmād dharmadhātuḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1169: tadaśuddhir viśuddhiś ca sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.20
T06vmvkbh_u:1170: viparyastasmanaskārāprahāṇan tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhis tatprahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti yad evaṃjñānam ayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:1172: dvayasyāgantukatvaṃ hi sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.21
T06vmvkbh_u:1175: dvayam apy etad āgantukam aviśuddhiru viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1178: saṃkleśaś ca viśuddhiś ca dharmapudgalayor na hi /
T06vmvkbh_u:1180: na hi pudgalasya saṃkleśo na viśuddhir nāpi dharmasya /
T06vmvkbh_u:1181: yasmān na pudgalo 'sti na dharmo yataś ca na kasyacit saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ ato na saṃkleśapakṣe kasyacid dhāniḥ na vyavadānapakse kasyacid viśeṣaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1182: yatas trāso vā syād unnatir vety ayam atrāse 'nunnatau cāviparyāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1184: ete ca daśāviparyāsā daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1187: āśrayo māyopamatā avikalpanatā prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1197: ta eva avikalpanato yena ca na vikalpayati nirvikalpena jñānena yac ca na vikalpayati prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1199: yad uta tribhiḥ svabhāvair avikalpanatayā ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1202: yady ete parikalpitaparatantralakṣaṇā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:1204: atha saṃvidyante dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā na (Mvbh 69) yujyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1206: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na vidyata upalabhyate ca yadi prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā dharmāṇāṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃkleśaḥ paścād vyavadānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1211: yady aprameyabuddhotpāde saty aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ kleśāpaśamaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1212: tat kathaṃ na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhir bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:1216: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1217: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
T06vmvkbh_u:1219: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //
T06vmvkbh_u:1224: antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katamā yā ratnakūṭe madhyamā pratipattir upadiṣṭā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1230: vikalpadvayatāntaś ca sa ca saptavidho mataḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1237: ekatvam ity antaḥ tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
T06vmvkbh_u:1239: yāvan na mānavapratyavekṣā ātmadarśane hi jīvas tac charīraṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1240: anyo jīvo 'nyac charīram iti bhavati darśanaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1243: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yā rūpādīnāṃ na nityapratyavekṣā nānityapratyavekṣā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1244: ātmeti pudgalasamāropāntaḥ nairātmyam ity apavādāntaḥ prajñaptisato 'py apavādāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1245: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad ātmanairātmyayor madhyaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1246: bhūtaṃ cittam iti dharmasamāropāntaḥ abhūtam ity apavādāntaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1247: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yatra na cittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1249: kuśalādayo vyavadānam iti pratipakṣāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yo 'syāntadvayasyānupagamo 'nudāhāro 'pravyāhāraḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1250: astīti śāśvatāntas tayor eva pudgaladharmayor nāstīty ucchedāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor dvayor antayor madhyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1252: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca tatpratipakṣaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1253: yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ cety antas tannirodho grāhyo grāhako vety anto yena mārgeṇa tan nirudhyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1255: dvidhā kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣabhedena tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etad iti vistareṇa vidyāvidyādīnāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvābhāvāt
T06vmvkbh_u:1262: yasya pratipakṣo jñānaśūnyatā jñānānimittaṃ jñānāpraṇihitaṃ ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1267: punarbhavaprabandhaś ca yasya pratipakṣo jñānājātiḥ jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1270: jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmā etena trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:1271: prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt tena yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti kalpayaty ayam antaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1274: yan na śūnyatayā dharmāñ chūnyāṃ karoti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1275: api tu dharmā eva śūnyā ity evamādi /
T06vmvkbh_u:1276: aparaḥ saptavidho vikalpadvayāntas tad yathā bhāve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ/
T06vmvkbh_u:1279: tad etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham iyaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
T06vmvkbh_u:1280: na khalu pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā api tu śūnyataiva śūnyā pūrvāntaśūnyatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1283: śamane 'pi vikalpo 'nataḥ praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanād etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham ākāśadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1284: trāsye 'pi vikalpo 'ntas tataś ca trāsyād bhaye 'pi parikalpitarūpāditrasanāt (/
T06vmvkbh_u:1286: pūrvako dṛṣṭāntaḥ śrāvakān ārabhyāyaṃ tu bodhisatvān /
T06vmvkbh_u:1287: grāhye 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ grāhake 'pi etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ māyākāradṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1291: arthābhāve vijñaptyasaṃbhavād ity etad atra sādharmyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1292: samyaktve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ mithyātve 'pi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena kalpayato mithyātvena vā etasyāntadvayasya parivarjanārthaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1296: jātaś ca tad eva kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahaty evam asamyaktvalakṣaṇāyā yathābhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:1297: samyaktvalakṣaṇam āryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vibhāvayatīty
T06vmvkbh_u:1298: etad atra sādharmyaṃ na cāsamyaktvalakṣaṇāpi bhūtapratyavekṣā mithyātvalakṣaṇā samyaktvānukūlyāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1300: avyāpṛtāv api jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1303: ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati
T06vmvkbh_u:1304: saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas
T06vmvkbh_u:1309: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu /
T06vmvkbh_u:1310: yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitātiriktatarā sā tatra viśiṣṭā sarvāsu ca sarvatra samudāgacchatīty aviśiṣṭā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1317: pragamaḥ praśaṭhatvaṃ ca prakarṣālambanaṃ mataṃ // V.28
T06vmvkbh_u:1319: yad uta dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmadhātvālambanaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1326: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmā vyavasthāpyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:1327: dvitīyan tathatā tṛtīyacaturthe te eva yathākramaṃ dharmadhātuprativedhena pāramitādidharmādhigamāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1336: ekādaśam aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau dvādaśaṃ navamyādibhūmitraye tad eva hi prathamadvayaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1337: tasyān tasyām avasthāyāṃ tattadālambanaṃ nāma labhate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1359: madhyamāpratipatprakāśanāt madhyāntavibhāgam apy etan madhyasyāntayoś ca prakāśanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1374: sā ca pratipattir yādṛśī paramā / yena ca
T06vmvkbh_u:1377: yathā yena prakāreṇāvikṣepapariṇatā ca śamathabhāvanayā aviparyāsapariṇatā ca vipaśyanābhāvanayā/
T06vmvkbh_u:1378: yadarthaṃ ca madhyamayā pratipadā niryāṇārthaṃ / yatra ca
T06vmvkbh_u:1394: // vyākhyām imām upanibadhya yad asti puṇyaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:1397: bodhitrayaṃ ca na cirāj jagad aśnuvīta //
